title: Yeah if we can have our Normal Draft back...

replies.body:
Shouldn't you post that in the EUNE boards instead of NA? We still have normal draft, so I don't know how it is relevant for the NA board.

Not saying you can't post it here or anything, just that it's kinda pointless.

It's being posted almost day and it's being completely ignored by riot. NA has higher Rioteer activity than EU(EUW and EUNE boards are merged into one) for whatever reason; hoping they at least notice this here.

IIRC they're planning on removing it from all servers in the future, so getting EUW and NA's support before that happens would be great.

It took them one year to give us back solo/duo and I"m hoping it doesn't take 1 year before they return Normal Draft.
